contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1954 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). The Three Musketeers Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:34 p.m. May 9, 2013, 10:14 p.m. 1 Oldham RBL Concert Band Leonard Lamb 2 Appleby Frodingham Works William H. Kendall 3 Slaithwaite Band James Hickman 4 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth 5 Prince-Smith and Stells Silver Band Reubon Lightfoot 6 ATM Works Band Norman Jones Unknown Result Eccles Borough Band E. Bradshaw Unknown Result Beswick Prize Albert Risby Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band M. Clayton Unknown Result Bolsover Colliery S.
